mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NUM PDN, P.MEMBER_ID, P.CATEGORY, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PD_CONTENT, P.PD_TITLE, P.PRICE, P.CREATE_DATE, P.VIEWS, P.SIDO_NAME, P.SIGUNGU_NAME, P.DONG_NAME, M.MEMBER_ID, M.NICKNAME, MP.CHANGE_NAME PN, P.STATUS, PF.FILE_ID, PF.PRODUCT_NUM, PF.ORIGIN_NAME, PF.CHANGE_NAME, PF.STATUS FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN MEMBER_PROFILE MP ON(P.MEMBER_ID = MP.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_FILE PF ON(P.PRODUCT_NUM = PF.PRODUCT_NUM AND (PF.STATUS = 'Y' OR PF.STATUS = 'M')) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.PRODUCT_NUM = #{ssNum} ORDER BY PF.STATUS
